title: Aftermath
brief_description: Dramatisation of a man who has been disabled and put into a wheel chair after an on-the-job accident. It explores his trials and tribulations of adjusting to a new life and facing his family etc. This film is designed to encourage the audience to think seriously about safety. A Teacher’s Guide is supplied. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
